text.autoconfig.cobbleaid.title: Cobble Aid Config
text.autoconfig.cobbleaid.option.debugMo: Whether to show detailed debug information in the console. This will log all messages to the console.
text.autoconfig.cobbleaid.option.extreme: Size at which pokemon are treated as extremely small.
Size at which pokemon are treated as extremely large.
text.autoconfig.cobbleaid.option.maxIvsT: # Max IVs (including hypertraining) at which Pokemon are treated as high IV. Currently this shows the bottlecap icon in PC.
text.autoconfig.cobbleaid.option.pcConfi: Shows an ability patch icon next to pokemon with their HA.
Shows a bottle cap icon next to pokemon with high IVs.
Shows a shiny icon next to shiny pokemon.
Shows a mushroom icon next to extreme sized pokemon.
Shows extra information about pokemon eggs in the PC.
Shows size and IV information of hovered pokemon in the PC.
